table_description: Projects allow you to organize your resources into groups that fit the way you work. You can group resources (like Droplets, Spaces, load balancers, domains, and floating IPs) in ways that align with the applications you host on DigitalOcean.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique universal identifier of this project.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The globally unique human-readable name for the project.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Time when the project was created.

columns.name: environment
columns.description: The environment of the project's resources.

columns.name: is_default
columns.description: If true, all resources will be added to this project if no project is specified.

columns.name: owner_id
columns.description: The integer id of the project owner.

columns.name: owner_uuid
columns.description: The unique universal identifier of the project owner.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Time when the project was updated.
